Car
Class JournyRecordStore

java.lang.Object
  Car.JournyRecordStore

public class JournyRecordStore
extends java.lang.Object

the class manage fetching journeys information from the database. Also, manage writeing, opening closing and deleting the database.

Author:
Suha

writeJournyinfo

public void writeJournyinfo(int j,
                            int avgs,
                            int mxs,
                            int darc,
                            int calldur,
                            int k,
                            int duk,
                            int y,
                            int m,
                            int dm,
                            int dw,
                            int h,
                            int mi)
write the journey information in the record store.

Parameters:
j - journey number.
avgs - jorney average speed.
mxs - journey maximum speed.
darc - number of calls.
calldur - duration of calls.
k - number of keys interaction.
duk - duration of key interactions.
y - the year the journey happend.
m - the month the journey happend.
dm - day of month the journay happend.
dw - day of week the journey happend.
h - hour of day the journey happend.
mi - minute of day the journy happend.
